current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the refinancing of certain Federal student
			 loans, and for other purposes.

If a Federal Direct Refinanced Private Loan is for a private education loan originally issued for
			 both undergraduate and graduate or professional postsecondary educational

			 Direct PLUS Loans for the
